name: NoChute
description:
Hurtle towards the earth while dodging birds, witches and meteorites. Probably a good game for people with the reflexes of a meth addict. Use the arrow keys or A and D on the keyboard to move left and right.

NoChute was made as part of the 2015 Something Awful GameDev Challenge, with the critical omission of poor Hubert's parachute. For more information on the game jam, as well as other entries, you can view the thread here: http://forums.somethingawful.com/showthread.php?th...

(This is the first time I've made a game of any sort, despite wanting to for ages. Other things I wish I had time to include are a proper high score system, as well as some sort of top-score-tweet-to-share thing, but then there's always future projects, right?)

If you want to download this game plus files of the music in it, you can get it here: http://rottendevice.bandcamp.com
